snippet: Under a bill that could curb the influence of the Securities and Exchange Commission, the White House would receive explicit authority to influence the rule-making process at independent agencies.
abstract: Under a bill that could curb the influence of the Securities and Exchange Commission, the White House would receive explicit authority to influence the rule-making process at independent agencies.

headline.main: Lawmakers Push to Increase White House Oversight of Financial Regulators
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Push to Increase White House Oversight of Financial Regulators

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
